articles.description: He went straight to the piano when the couple said their first dance would be to a Coldplay song.
articles.content:
Media caption, Watch: Coldplay's Chris Martin plays a couple's wedding song in a pub
A couple who are soon to marry say their dreams came true when Chris Martin from Coldplay played their wedding da… [+1613 chars]
